description: O'Brien  Provincial ParkLat: 55.0652422439   Long: -118.822285581Nestled among majestic balsam poplars along the banks of the Wapiti River just south of Grande Prairie, O?Brien Provincial Park is a popular picnic destination. A shoreline trail provides access to the river.Information:780-538-5350  Natural Region:Boreal Forest - Dry Mixedwood   LUF Region:Upper Peace  Park Size:161.15 Acres  /  65.22 Ha
directions: 12km south of Grande Prairie turn go over Wapiti bridge turn right on 666 then look for park entrance trailhead at entrance
title: Obrien Park Trail
